Workshop.reasoning: Captures both hands-on workshops and structured discussions

Conference.reasoning: Most events labeled as conferences are actually info sessions or talks

Meetup / Mixer.reasoning: Split based on purpose: networking vs structured activities

Hackathon.reasoning: More comprehensive to include other competitive formats

Other.reasoning: Distribute to specific categories based on content

keyEventExamples.title: Thinking Big Science
keyEventExamples.reasoning: Structured discussion with group rotations, practical outcomes, and idea exploration - not just networking

keyEventExamples.title: Dundee Activator Info Session
keyEventExamples.reasoning: Program information session, not a full conference

keyEventExamples.title: London AI Nexus Demo Night
keyEventExamples.reasoning: Technical showcase/demo event with competitive element

immediate: Update category structure to use 6 final categories
Create clear definitions for each category
shortTerm: Re-categorize all existing events using new structure
Update AI categorization logic and prompts
Update user interface to show new categories
longTerm: Gather user feedback on new categories
